functions.name: mod_forum_add_discussion

message.desc: New Discussion message (only html format allowed)

name.desc:
The allowed keys (value format) are:
                                        discussionsubscribe (bool); subscribe to the discussion?, default to true
                                        discussionpinned    (bool); is the discussion pinned, default to false
                                        inlineattachmentsid              (int); the draft file area id for inline attachments
                                        attachmentsid       (int); the draft file area id for attachments

value.desc:
The value of the option,
                                                            This param is validated in the external function.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Add a new discussion into an existing forum.

functions.name: mod_forum_add_discussion_post

postid.desc:
the post id we are going to reply to
                                                (can be the initial discussion post

message.desc: new post message (html assumed if messageformat is not provided)

name.desc:
The allowed keys (value format) are:
                                        discussionsubscribe (bool); subscribe to the discussion?, default to true
                                        private (bool); make this reply private to the author of the parent post, default to false.
                                        inlineattachmentsid              (int); the draft file area id for inline attachments
                                        attachmentsid       (int); the draft file area id for attachments
                                        topreferredformat (bool); convert the message & messageformat to FORMAT_HTML, defaults to false

value.desc:
the value of the option,
                                                            this param is validated in the external function.

messageformat.desc: message format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

            returned.

functions.name: mod_forum_update_discussion_post

postid.desc: Post to be updated. It can be a discussion topic post.

message.desc: Updated post message (HTML assumed if messageformat is not provided)

messageformat.desc: message format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

name.desc:
The allowed keys (value format) are:
                                pinned (bool); (only for discussions) whether to pin this discussion or not
                                discussionsubscribe (bool); whether to subscribe to the post or not
                                inlineattachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for inline attachments in the text
                                attachmentsid (int); the draft file area id for attachments

status.desc: True if the post/discussion was updated, false otherwise.

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning
